Job Title: 01 Specialist Production Technology (F/M/D)

Location: Knox County, TN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
19205

Leoni is a global provider of products and solutions for energy and data management in the automotive sector and other industries. The value chain encompasses wires, optical fibers, standardized cables and special cables through to custom-developed wiring systems and related components as well as services. As an innovation partner and solutions provider, Leoni supports its customers with pronounced development and systems expertise. The market-listed group of companies employs about 100,000 people in 30 countries and generated consolidated sales of EUR 4.1 billion in 2020.

 And we are looking for you. 

TN-23-Mateur South

Your Tasks

Implement LEONI Operating System in Country Production FacilityPerform activities in order to establish parameters for production equipment during product changes and new introductionInterface with Production Management team to learn and thorough knowledge for new Equipment.Perform activities in order to establish and document in local work instructions machine operating method.Coaching/training for Production Maintenance team regarding Equipment Maintenance.Manage Unplan downtime and Lessons Learned for improve downtime within Country Level.Support Production Maintenance team to solve critical/rare problems on equipment.Deals with the order of the equipment including applicators, specification, technical characteristics, studies the corresponding requirements of the client.Coordinate and perform activities for commissioning of production equipment in close relations with other departmentsDrives improvement initiatives regarding setup time, scrap, rework…Give input to creation maintenance planEquipment management including receiving, installation guideline/WI, lead/coordination equipment release, FG booking in system and tracking. Define the spare parts stock level for all equipment and applicators.Maintain database for equipment and applicators in system.

Your Skills

Level of Education: University degree Branch of Study: Industrial- Electrical - Mechanical - Mechatronics or similarExperience: 4 years of experience in the automotive industry is appreciated Language: French and English Social competences: Communication /Social & intercultural sensitivity / Change management /Target & result orientation/ Motivation & resilience /Self-organization / Conflict management / Teamwork Professional competences: Engineering Optimization/Engineering Standards and Procedures/Installation Qualification (IQ)/Problem Analysis/Production Process

Next steps?

Apply online. We are looking forward to meeting you.

LEONI “Mateur South”

“Saoussen Saaidi”, Human Resources Management

 People of all genders are always meant equally; For linguistic simplification and better readability, only the masculine form is used in the text.

LEONI processes your application data in an IT-system that is consistent across the company and uses Foreign Service providers. By sending your application, you agree to this procedure. LEONI ensures the compliance with data protection.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

job_responsibilities: Implement LEONI Operating System in Country Production Facility
Perform activities in order to establish parameters for production equipment during product changes and new introduction
Interface with Production Management team to learn and thorough knowledge for new Equipment

Manage Unplan downtime and Lessons Learned for improve downtime within Country Level
Support Production Maintenance team to solve critical/rare problems on equipment
Deals with the order of the equipment including applicators, specification, technical characteristics
Studies the corresponding requirements of the client
Coordinate and perform activities for commissioning of production equipment in close relations with other departments
Drives improvement initiatives regarding setup time, scrap, rework
Give input to creation maintenance plan
Equipment management including receiving, installation guideline/WI, lead/coordination equipment release, FG booking in system and tracking
Define the spare parts stock level for all equipment and applicators
Maintain database for equipment and applicators in system
